value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop!  Tabular Editor 2 https://github.com/TabularEditor/TabularEditor  Tabular Editor 3 https://tabulareditor.com/  ðŸ“¢

value.title: Power BI Desktop And Role-Playing Dimensions: Can you do it?
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick talks about Power BI Desktop and role-playing dimensions. Can you even do this in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.

value.title: STOP refreshing a single table at a time! (Power BI Desktop)

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Power BI Desktop Download or Microsoft Store App   Which One is better
value.excerpt: If you want to develop Power BI reports, you'll need the Power BI Desktop application. However, Power BI Desktop application comes in two ways; Download it separately and install it on your Windows machine, or Get it from Microsoft Store as an App. The question that I often get is; What is the difference?

value.title: Deep dive into measure filters in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we perform a deep analysis of the DAX queries generated by Power BI when you use a measure as a filter in a Power BI visual. The DAX code generated might show a different behavior whether the measure is part of the values shown in the visual or not.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/721618?aff=yt

value.title: Add DAX calculation groups to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: Learn how you can add many similar measures to your model.

value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Use DAX in Power BI Desktop to solve business problems
value.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll solve three different business problems by optimizing the data model and creating Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) calculations.

value.title: Design interactive data experiences with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI enables report authors to produce interactive reports using visuals, slicers, bookmarks, and more.

value.title: 3 Best practices when transforming data in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, I go through the what I believe are best practices for cleaning your data in Power BI: 1. Rename your query steps 2. Change Data types to all columns 3. Write comments on query Steps (juni 2016 update) and other tricks.  Here is a link to the Power BI file, if you want to check it out:

value.title: Automatic custom backgrounds for Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: How can you with no effort besides the original set up, create stunning reports every single time? In this tutorial, i will show you how to set up a custom background for every new page automatically, so you reports wont look dull and white and will stand out among the crowds. value.title: Create a data connection shortcut with PBIDS files - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: The power bi team has released a new Power bi file extension called PBIDS (power bi direct source), that allows you to configure a file with all the connection details of a data source. Here is how you configure it and my thoughts on it.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
